Package gov.nasa.worldwindx.applications.sar.render

Class PlaneModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.worldwindx.applications.sar.render.PlaneModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable
    public class PlaneModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable
    Renders a plane model at a position with a given heading. The plane is parallel to the ground. An optional 'shadow' shape is rendered on the ground.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PlaneModel()
      Renders a plane model with the defaul dimensions and color.
      PlaneModel​(java.lang.Double length, java.lang.Double width, java.awt.Color color)
      Renders a plane model with the specified dimensions and color.
